_sText:
This is another smash map to go along my collection of smash maps I have created. This time I have tried to test the limits of the physics engine and push it right to it's edge.

I have tried a new technique of making smash maps by making the smash blocks come out of all 4 corners of the map, which allows for a hefty amount of structures in the middle.

This map isn't recommended to be played on a listen server as it can produce a little bit of lag, but not much. I recommend you host this on a seperate server as you'll get the most enjoyable experience that way.
Put the .bsp in your \maps folder.

_aChangeLog.text: You now can not die from fall damage at all.

_sText: 5th map to my smash series, this one ends really quickly but gives a good blast of fun.
:D

**mg_smash_madness**

This is my first ever released map on CSS, I am a bit late because of the release of CS:GO I know but I prefer CSS in general.

**Map Description**

Made for the new Trinity community, mg_smash_madness is a map about surviving incoming blocks that will obliterate the platforms that holds you're life, what team will survive the longest?

Note: This map is physics intensive.

_sText:
Survive the disaster of the blocks demolishing the platforms one by one, who will survive the longest?

Includes two map files.
One for just terrorist spawns and another that includes both counter terrorist and terrorist spawns.

Place the map in your cstrike/maps folder

This is a smash map.

There is 1 terrorist and 32 CT slots.

The object of the game is for the CT's to run the course as quickly as they can. The first to reach the end will see an AWP on the floor. Pick it up to kill the T from either far away or from triggering a teleport.

The object for the T is to use the cannon (by pressing your use key on the button) and move the cannon around with "wasd" and fire the cannon at the CT's with "left mouse button".

You may ask, "Can't the T just shoot ahead of the map?" No. There are doors placed in front of the pillars that block that from happening. When one CT reaches a point in front of the next section it will make the door go down, allowing the T to shoot at that spot.

The map isn't 100% foul proof, but it is more of a test on a different idea that I have yet to see.

 Currently tested it on a server with 10 players and everyone had a blast. Hope you do to.

*recommends at least 2 players but not required to test the maps functions. Also recommended on a NoBlock Server.

This is a Smash Map that took me a pretty long time to make, this is the best map I have ever made so far...
I think it will do well.
----------
I want to also thank Alice Deejay for the awesome song "Better off Alone"
----------
CTs and Ts spawn on different sides of the map with no weapons, they must survive 1 and a half minutes before advancing on to the knife arena with a song and to knife, and if you choose, to knife above lava.

UPDATE:
8/6/09 = New update to map: Better Lighting , I kind of forgot about the lighting, so its way better now!

_aChangeLog.text: You now can not die from fall damage at all.
Health will reset to 100 instantly upon damage.
Changed timings on the block spawning.
Platforms won't be instantly destroyed anymore, it will take a few more seconds before it completely disappears.
After 180 seconds, everything will start flying, to prevent games from taking too long to end.
Spread the spawns around the map.
Added an extra map file for only T spawns.

MG_SMASH_CANNONSZ --------------------------- My 3rd Smash Map! Yay! The 2 Terrorists must shoot blocks from there cannons at the platforms with the CT's on. After 60 sections the T's must run up a ramp whilst the CT's shoot them in an epic battle! The cannons make the blocks totally random as they are both player controlled. I set it at 60 secsonds because experience players with cannons will be able to knock down all the blocks with a bit of luck ;) NOTE: PLEASE DO NOT DECOMPILE AND USE ITEMS FROM THIS MAP. Also I will be posting the cannon prefab later on today for anyone wanting to use it. Also My Smash Cannon Prefab Can Be Found Here: http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/3354 Have Fun!

Ok, this map is based on the smash maps that are floating around on FPSbanana, more specifically the ones with cannons.

This map involves a team of 4 terrorists who try to prevent the counter-terrorists from making it across the map(an arsenal of AWPs awaits the CTs). There are a total of 8 turrets on the map that the terrorists can use. Once the CTs make it past a certain point, a teleporter will open up and allow the terrorists to advance to a second turret as a final defense.

The map features:

- 76 Fully breakable platforms that allow the CTs various paths to the end.
- 4 "safe houses" that are much harder to knock off(the base does not break or move)
- all platforms are respawnable.(respawn times vary based on the size of the plaform)
- random path remover system that will remove some paths to vary the gameplay at start.
- an AFK system(kills the afkers)
- 3 included songs for optional playback. (Xenogenocide - Black Hole Earth Consumption, DJ TiÃ«sto - Personal Reflexion, and Waterflame - -Control: Crowd- )



Map Requires mp_limitteams 0 server setting.
Player Slots: 36 (4 terrorist and 32 Counter-terrorists)

_aChangeLog.text: You now can not die from fall damage at all.
Attempt #2 to fix the insane amount of lag.

_sText:
The 4th map to my smash map series, this one ends a lot quicker than my previous ones, who will remain the last standing survivor?

Note: you can climb the tall towers and there is an issue with the props colliding so much that it lags slightly.

It is T vs. CT, you will spawn in a stadium where you have to knife the opposite team. But 1 of the players on both teams are teleported to their cannon, and have to shoot the floor under the enemy's team. Beware though, you can shoot your own team down. (When one of the 2 teams are shot down, the player that controls the cannon on the losers team, will die too) The cannons shoots 5 different things: (when you fire, the cannon chooses randomly 1 of the 5 things) Green filecase Dryer Rock Computer monitor Radiator It is quite fun, and i hope you will think that too. If I did not say enough please write a comment. For those who wanted lighting (suns and shadows), It just couldn't happen/ did not work! + It is a minigame map so it does not really matter - Enjoy This is the sequel of my original map (there were a fault with version 2, therefore v3): mg_smashfloor

It is T vs. CT, you will spawn in a stadium where you have to knife the opposite team. 
But 1 of the players on both teams are teleported to their cannon, 
and have to shoot the floor under the enemy's team.
 
Beware though, you can shoot your own team down.


(When one of the 2 teams are shot down, 
the player that controls the cannon on the losers team, will die too)


The cannons are shooting 5 different things: 
(when you fire, the cannon chooses randomly 1 of the 5 things)

Green filecase

Dryer

Rock

Computer monitor

Radiator


It is quite fun, and i hope you will think that too.

If I did not say enough please write a comment.

- Enjoy! :)

Ski down the hill and fight your enemies. Same ski map with additions and edits for the christmas season to add some christmas spirit. Please don't play this version of ski mountain long after christmas is over lol... 
Changelist:
Added snow effects at bottom
Brightened lights inside to make more visible
Added christmas presents conceiling the weapons
Added candy canes that spawn around the map randomly timed 30secs-2mins that heal for 50 hp when grabbed
Added christmas tree inside building
Added presents around tree with defuser kit and famas
Added fireplace inside
Added christmas colors to my signature in map

This is my christmas present to you all enjoy.

Set up for 64 spawns
Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here by messaging me here or finding me in game. My steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918
Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on similar ideas ect..

With the permission of Tomgreen, I proudly present you..
mg_ski_mountain_resort_fix
(a complete makeover of mg_ski_mountain)
mg_ski_mountain_resort_fix?!
mg_ski_mountain_resort_FIX - Changes..
 Tried to make a better gameplay in the building on the bottom of the mountain. Did that by closing the back of it.

- You can land on the green bushes in the building without taking any fall damage - (3rd screen)
- You can slide on the ski lifts and gain extra speed. (idea: AnOriginalRob) Still, it's not easy to get on them without dying!
- You can't see trough the small windows from any side. Better for the gameplay and to sneakily taking down your enemy
- Added few guns
- The hole in the ceiling got deleted as it caused camping.
- The top glass windows of the building can only be broken when someone lands on it, so when the pressure's high enough.

- Please redownload and replace this version with the older v1!
That's right. Finally a new update on this map, now with a great ski lodge! Extra surframps got added, extra weapons, quite a few secrets and a bunch of new possibilities to literally fly trough the lodge. This map was not made from scratch, though everything got deleted besides the original ski mountain (and its components) and the structure of the map.

What's new.. Well, first of all I tried working on the design of the building on the bottom of the mountain. With new custom textures and models I tried to make the best of it. It's more a cartoony building instead of a realistic one. However, a realistic building wouldn't fit the map and wouldn't do good for the performance of the map.

Two new songs got added. You'll need to find out how to activate them. (not a big deal)

In the third screenshot you see a yellow circle. There are two of them and they spawn by 25 percent chance. If they spawn, you could try flying trough them.. No idea why that would be good.. eh.. r.. right.

Thanks to everyone listed somewhere on this page, especially Tomgreen for giving me the opportunity to modify this map. I'd also like to thank Kaemon for saying what I had to do to optimize this map, and also Paul for giving me the chance to test this map a bunch of times on the Steamgamers minigame server with it's nice amount of players.

Enjoy!

A Skiing map where you have fun going down the hill and can collect your weapons to kill the enemies. Bomb site at the interior pool at the bottom, and chair lift teleports back up to the top. Get air skiing by surfing sideways then quickly turning off of the slope. Lots of fun. (if you cant see your crosshair make it translucent)

**This is just an alternate version with a different assortment of structures that make for different gameplay at the bottom. Has some different weapon set ups and anti spawn shooting ect. Just another version I made a while ago finally decided to upload enjoy.**

Playing tips: To avoid getting stuck on the ramp get air periodically by jumping or surfing away from the slope and you will never get randomly stopped. Also pistols are more accurate mid air/surfing than primary guns since the updates.

Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here, message me or find me in game Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918 Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on similar idea.

Mg_ski_jumps_v2 public beta is a NEW GAME MODE IN Counter-Strike: Source.

I have made it for FUN, more experience in creating map for Source Engine and... make better the world's 1st game - Counter-Strike: Source!


HOW TO PLAY?

Ski and jump, when flying collect "colored lights" to speed up = better distance = better score = better frags;

BOTS ARE WORKING AT THIS MAP! (90% - sometimes any bot stuck)


Features:
- Very advanced trigger system:
- Queue system
- Automatic player moving from Landing point to Queue
- Scoring system (good landing distances = good frags)

- Good lighting at map
- LOT OF FUN :-)
- NEW GAME MODE - SKI JUMPING!
- Many more... ;-)

Thanks to "Robin" for the sleight prefab.

v2 Version:
!- Restart round system (for join new players from spectator)
- Map size is up to 2x
